definition: in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, Edward was very fond of cooking and foodstuff.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，愛德華非常喜歡烹飪和食品。

sentences.english: In fact, I usually don't catch anything.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我通常什麼都釣不上來。

sentences.english: The fact that you have control over all the clients helps.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，你能夠控制所有客戶的話是很有幫助的。

sentences.english: Indeed, there are a fair number of Mr. Lonelyhearts on campus.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，孤獨先生在校園裏確實不少。

sentences.english: But the scene is actually an optical illusion.
sentences.chinese: 而事實上，這樣的場景只是一種光學錯覺。

sentences.english: But in fact it was McEwan's funniest novel for years.
sentences.chinese: 但是事實上這是他數年來最爲風趣的一本著作。

sentences.english: In fact, Yang Chengxing's case is by no means a rare one.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，毫無疑問，楊誠星的例子是很罕見的。

sentences.english: In fact, it is one that will shake him-and many others-to the core.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，真相讓他和很多人內心深處受到極大震撼。

sentences.english: in fact, building sucess is base on the binding of the two .
sentences.chinese: 事實上，成功的確建立在兩方面完全融合的基礎上。

sentences.english: In fact, it is more of a philosophy that envelops every aspect of the project.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，它更是一種涵蓋了項目的各個方面的哲學。

sentences.english: Indeed, we have a natural repugnance to so doing.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我們有一個天然的反感，以這樣做。

sentences.english: In fact we need to kick Turkey out of NATO.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我們需要把土雞國踢出北約。

sentences.english: In fact, what Bynum is doing now mirrors Bryant's M. O .
sentences.chinese: 事實上，拜納姆現在的作爲正式科比的映射。

sentences.english: In fact, the mankind have been aring set up a network of break the space and time restriction.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，人類一直在構建突破空間與時間限制的網絡。

sentences.english: In fact, we import more gasoline into Afghanistan than any other product.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我們從阿富汗進口最多的物資就是汽油。
